palath sabha mathiwaranayen rajayata athiwishishta jayagrahahanayak laba dun uuwe janathawa rajayata erehi siyalu kumanthrana parajayata path kara athayi uthuru mada palath pradhana amathi es.em. ranjith samarakon mahatha pawasayi.uuwa palath sabha mathiwaranaye di e.ja.pa. ya ha ja.wi.pe. sathu siyalu shakthiya yodawa antha parajayak laba gena athayi da wipakshaye gamanaka awasanaya sanituhan kala uuwe janathawata mulu mahath jathiyema pranamaya himi wena bawa da pradhana amathiwaraya kiyayi.uuwa palath sabhawa athulu pasugiya kalaya thula pawathi palath sabha mathiwarana walin aanduwa wadi chanda wisipanlakshayakin idiriyen sitina bawa da pradhana amathiwaraya pawasayi.ranil wikramasinha mahatha paksha nayakathwaya aarakshakara ganime satanaka yedi siti.

hiru yanu samuhika kriya karithwayaka prathipalayak.87-89 waka wanuwen pasu ja.wipe nawatha godanagime kriyawaliya, hiru puwathpatha goda nanwima, hiru kandayama bihi wima, hiru kandayama ha demala jathika aragalaya athara athi sambandaya, hiru kandayama thula mathuwu arbudayan,madhyawedin rata hara yama ha ehi sabawa athulu boho deshapalana karanawange ithihasaya bohodenku nodannawa menma ema nodanna kame wasiyen boho bol pilima gal pilima men samajaye pawathima nathara kalayuthu kalaya dan pamina atha yannayi mage adahasa.me wenuwen parakum salakiya yuthu kalayaka sita gena yana aragalayata garu karaminda, eema karyata kisima aakarayakin sahayogaya nodakwima sambandawa samawa illaminda, parakum wetha yojanawak karami, eya nam, mema nodanna ha sagawa thabagena sitina ithihasaya piliwalakata obage blogaya pawichchi karamin liyamuya yannayi.
